thread.title: Restaurant has very weird customer delivery request – leaves staff 'screaming'
thread.title_full: Restaurant has very weird customer delivery request – leaves staff 'screaming'

author: Joshua Barrie
title: Restaurant has very weird customer delivery request – leaves staff 'screaming'
text:
Restaurant has very weird customer delivery request – leaves staff 'screaming' Not just a pizza Quite an absurd request (Photo: Twitter/@cxloe) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
An emboldened pizza fan last night requested an incredibly eccentric addition to their food order. It's quite something. 
The unnamed customer (you'll see why), hungrily sent in an order to Firehouse Pizza in Booterstown, Dublin, on Thursday. 
On it were the regular things – a 'create your own' pizza, featuring chorizo, Cajun chicken, sweetcorn, and caramelized red onion (sounds quite nice), with some sweet potato fries (error), and a Coke. 
But, as you may be aware, on the Just Eat delivery app there's also the option for special requests. This one was a bit bizarre: "spare toilet roll". The message was shared by @cxloe on Twitter. "I'm screaming"
